Hello! How can I help you today?
give me some cool python code

Sure! Here's a simple Python code snippet that generates a random number between 1 and 10:

```python
import random

random_number = random.randint(1, 10)
print("Random number generated: ", random_number)
```

You can run this code in your Python environment to see a random number being generated each time you run the script. Let me know if you would like to see more code examples or have any specific requests!
